biotools.summary:
a Nonlinear Analysis Toolbox for Neuroimaging.

non-linear neuroimage analysis toolbox.

This project is maintained by imatge-upc.

NeAT (Neuroimaging Analysis Toolbox) is a command-line toolbox written in Python that provides the tools to analyze the linear and nonlinear dynamics of a particular tissue and study the statistical significance of such dynamics at the voxel level.
